Elijah LeeTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 30 Jun 2019I always believe in value for money. Sure, if I need to get to the airport with large luggage in tow, in the middle of the night, grab/taxi might be worth it for the convenience it brings.If not, it boils down to planning. If you need to be at a place in 1 hr, and it takes 1 hr to get there, then leave now. If you need 30 mins to prepare, then make sure 1.5 hrs before hand you start preparing to leave. Just that simple act of planning ahead will trim down your costs dramatically. Singapore is not a big place, and frankly if your destination is near public transportation, there's really no need to take private hire transport.3 comments6
